text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Who...these effing👇👇👇”law-abiding citizens” ⁉️  You can stop pretending @realDonaldTrump cares about an old piece of stone, because he knows the COVID-19 issue is kicking that ass! 🦠Should 🦠be his top priority !😷😷😷#MeMeMeMe🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️ https://t.co/jyfdomUajX
